00004 #define LightSensorAddress  0b01110010 // 0x39
00005 #define MAXLUX 1846 // standard mode max
00006 
00007 // Table for channel ratio (i.e. channel1 / channel0)
00008 static unsigned char ratioLut[129] PROGMEM = {
00009 100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,
00010 100,100,100,100,100,100,99,99,
00011 99,99,99,99,99,99,99,99,

00027 // Table to convert channel values to counts
00028 static unsigned short countLut[128] PROGMEM = {
00029 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7,
00030 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15,
00031 16, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 30,

00046 void sleepModeLight(void){
00047     I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00048     I2C_WRITE(0x00);            // Power-down state
00049 
00050         return ;
00051 }
00052 
00053 unsigned char WakeUpModeLight(void){
00054         unsigned char ret = -1;
00055         unsigned char count = 0;
00056 
00057         do {
00058         ret = I2C_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG); 
00059 
00060         if(ret == 0){
00061 
00062         I2C_WRITE(0x03); 
00063 
00064         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00065         ret = I2C_READ_ACK();
00066         }
00067 
00068         if(count++ > 10) 
00069             return 1;
00070 
00071         } while(ret != 0x03);                   // While Response of command WakeUp is not 0x03
00072 
00073         return 0;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void setExtendedMode(void){
00077     I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00078         I2C_WRITE(0x1D);                        // Extended range mode
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 void ResetToStandardMode(void){
00083     I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00084         I2C_WRITE(0x18);                        // Extended range mode
00085 }
00086 
00087 unsigned char readAdc0(void){
00088         unsigned char readValue = 0;
00089 
00090         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00091         I2C_WRITE(0x43);
00092 
00093         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00094         readValue = I2C_READ_ACK(); 
00095 
00096         return readValue;
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 unsigned char readAdc1(void){
00101         unsigned char readValue = 0;
00102 
00103         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00104         I2C_WRITE(0x83);
00105 
00106         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00107         readValue = I2C_READ_ACK(); 
00108 
00109         return readValue;
00110 }
00111 
00112 // simplified lux equation approximation using tables
00113 unsigned short calculateLux(unsigned char channel0, unsigned char channel1)
00114 {
00115         unsigned long lux = 0;
00116         // lookup count from channel value
00117         unsigned short count0 = pgm_read_byte_near(countLut[channel0&0b01111111]);
00118         unsigned short count1 = pgm_read_byte_near(countLut[channel1&0b01111111]);
00119 
00120         // calculate ratio
00121         unsigned char ratio = 128; // default
00122 
00123         // avoid division by zero - count1 cannot be greater than count0
00124         if((count0) && (count1 <= count0))
00125                 ratio = ((count1 * 128) / count0);
00126 
00127         // calculate lux
00128         lux = (((count0-count1) * pgm_read_byte_near(ratioLut[ratio]))  / 256);
00129 
00130         // if lux is over MAXLUX, put MAXLUX as maximum
00131         if(lux > MAXLUX)
00132                 lux = MAXLUX;
00133 
00134         return ((unsigned short) lux);
00135 }
00136 
00137 int getLight(void){
00138         int light=0;
00139         unsigned char temp, adc0, adc1;
00140 
00141         /* Wait Data Light available */
00142         if(WakeUpModeLight() == 1) {
00143                 return -1;
00144         }
00145 
00146     setExtendedMode();
00147     do{
00148         adc0 = readAdc0(); 
00149     adc1 = readAdc1(); 
00150     }
00151     while(! (adc0 & 128 && adc1 & 128));
00152     light = calculateLux(adc0,adc1);
00153 
00154     sleepModeLight();
00155     I2C_STOP();
00156 
00157         return light;
00158 }

00161 /*****************************************************************************/
00162 
00163 #define TemperatureSensorAddress  0b10010010       
00164 
00165 int sleepMode(void){
00166         unsigned char ret = -1;
00167         ret = I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress);  
00168 
00169         if(ret != 0)
00170                 return ret;
00171 
00172      I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // write on confiuration register
00173      I2C_WRITE(0xC0);                        // Put SuhtDown mode, start one shot convertion
00174      I2C_STOP();
00175 
00176 return 0;
00177 }
00178 
00179 int WakeUpMode(void){
00180         unsigned char ret = -1;
00181         ret = I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress);  
00182 
00183         if(ret != 0)
00184                 return ret;
00185 
00186         I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00187         I2C_WRITE(0x40);            //WakeUP
00188         I2C_STOP();
00189 
00190 return 0;
00191 }
00192 
00193 int configureTemperature(void){
00194     int t;
00195     I2C_INIT();
00196 
00197     t=I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00198         if(t!=0)
00199         return t;
00200 
00201         I2C_WRITE(0x04);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00202         I2C_WRITE(0xE0);                        // 14bits resolution & Timeout Off0xE0
00203         
00204         I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00205         I2C_WRITE(0x40);                        
00206 
00207         I2C_STOP();
00208 return 0;
00209 }
00210 
00211 int getTemperature(void){
00212         int temperature=0;
00213         unsigned char temp;
00214 
00215         WakeUpMode();
00216 
00217         /* Wait data temperature available */
00218         do {
00219         I2C_START_WAIT(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);  
00220 
00221         I2C_WRITE(0x04);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00222         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);  // Send a responce request
00223         temp = I2C_READ_NACK();                 // Read the response
00224 
00225         I2C_STOP();
00226         }
00227         while(!(temp & 0x01));                  // While Data Available Flag is not set
00228 
00229         /* Read the TEMPERATURE DATA REGISTER */
00230         I2C_START_WAIT(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);  
00231 
00232         I2C_WRITE(0x00);                        // Write the temperature data register 0x00
00233         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00234         temperature = I2C_READ_NACK()<<8;            // Read the response
00235         
00236         I2C_WRITE(0x10);                        // Write the temperature hight byte data register 0x00
00237         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00238         temperature = I2C_READ_NACK()<<8;            // Read the response
00239         
00240         I2C_WRITE(0x11);                        // Write the temperature low byte data register 0x00
00241         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00242         temperature |= I2C_READ_NACK();            // Read the response
00243 
00244         I2C_STOP();
00245 
00246         /* Go to sleep mode */
00247         sleepMode();
00248 
00249 return temperature/128;
00250 }
